markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Skeletal Claw](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1718)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 1,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Tekko-kagi](/Weapons.aspx?ID=101)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [tekko-kagi](/Weapons.aspx?ID=101)_ resembles a clawed skeletal hand that fits over your own. Embedded in the back of the bony hand is an onyx gemstone held in place by fine silver chains. When the claws tear into a living creature, the gem pulses with negative energy. The _skeletal claw_ deals an additional 1d4 [persistent negative damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) to living creatures (1d10 persistent negative damage on a critical hit).

<document level="2" id="action-1283" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Skeletal Claw
